meta.label: (Text Analytics API) Entities Detection
meta.description: Detect entities in your text using the Azure Cognitive Services API for text analytics

inputRoles.name: input-dataset
inputRoles.label: Input Dataset
inputRoles.description: Dataset containing the data to analyze

outputRoles.name: output-dataset
outputRoles.label: Output Dataset
outputRoles.description: Dataset containing the enriched data from the Azure API

params.name: api-key
params.label: API Key
params.description: Enter your Azure Cognitive Services API Key

params.name: azure-location
params.label: Azure Location
params.description: Name of the Azure location for your API Key

params.name: text-column
params.label: Text Column
params.description: Name of the column storing the text to analyze

params.name: language-column
params.label: Language Column
params.description: Name of the column storing the language of the text in ISO 639-1 format (optional)

params.name: output-column
params.label: Output Column
params.description: Name of the column storing the output of the analysis

params.name: batch-size
params.label: Batch Size
params.description: Number of records to send to the API at a time

params.name: reading-limit
params.label: Read Limit
params.description: Limit the number of input records to read (optional, blank for no limit)
